text: Twinkie the Kid is the mascot for Twinkies, a cream-filled snack cake. He is a trademark of Interstate Bakeries Corporation and has appeared on Twinkie packaging, in commercials, and as collectible related merchandise. ==Description== Twinkie the Kid is an anthropomorphized Twinkie, which means he is a Twinkie that has been given human-like features. He looks like a wrangler and wears boots, gloves, a kerchief, and a ten-gallon hat. ==Related pages== *Captain Cupcake *Fruit Pie the Magician Category:Advertising Category:Mascots Category:Animated characters
title: Twinkie the Kid
